pullRequest.title: DBZ-2167 Use legacy parser for testing purposes only

commit.message: DBZ-2167 Use legacy parser for testing purposes only

afterCommit.message: DBZ-2167 Use legacy parser for testing purposes only

nodes.bodyText: Ugh :) Why again do we need TokenStream in main? And if it's truly needed over there (and not test-only), can't we extend?
How about moving the affected tests to the MySQL connector module then, so we could get rid of the Legacy parser impl altogether?

commit.message: DBZ-2167 Remove legacy parser completely; tests depending on parser move to MySQL

DBZ-2167 Remove superfluous char

Co-authored-by: Gunnar Morling <gunnar.morling@googlemail.com>
